text: Pino Daniele (19 March 1955 â€“ 4 January 2015) was an Italian singer- songwriter, and guitarist.Pino Daniele unico italiano al Festival dei chitarristi He was born in Naples, Italy. He was known for his songs; Passi d'autore of 2004 and Il Fatto Quotidiano. On January 5th, 2015, it was announced via Instagram by Daniele's longtime friend Eros Ramazzotti that he had died from a heart attack between 4 and 5 January. Daniele is considered to have been one of the best singer-songwriters in Italian history.http://www.soundsblog.it/post/326364/pino-daniele-morto-infarto http://www.ilsecoloxix.it/p/cultura/2015/01/05/ARYTOe5C-morto_pino_daniele.shtml Daniele's death was confirmed at 10:45pm at "Sant'Eugenio" Hospital in Rome (Italy) on 4 January. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Entertainers from Campania Category:Italian guitarists Category:Italian singer-songwriters Category:Musicians from Naples Category:Singers from Naples
title: Pino Daniele
